about_the_game:
TORIDAMA, the courage-testing game, is back and better than ever!

TORIDAMA features a collection of mini ""chicken"" games.

The number of mini games to diagnose your Chicken Level has been increased to 25!
In Crazy Mode, where heated competitions take place for the worldwide rankings!

The game still features the casual and fun gameplay of the previous title, so you can enjoy playing together with friends and family.

◆There's a total of 25 mini games!
""Stop the player going up the stairs right before they fall off a cliff!""
""Reveal yourself in time to avoid getting attacked by a ghost!""
""Flip on your bike mid-air before landing on the ground!""
Play 25 different mini games that test your courage in all sorts of situations.

Play 5 mini games picked at random, and aim for a high score.
A variety of intense situations will test your timidness, or your Chicken Level, based on timing and button pushing.

◆Enjoy heated chicken games! Multiplayer Mode available!
You'll be able to compete in multiplayer Chicken Level challenges while looking at each other's screens.
Use the last seconds of battle to see which one is the real chicken.

◆Stand atop the world with Crazy Mode!
Crazy Mode features worldwide rankings and becomes available when all mini games are unlocked.
This game mode will have you constantly at the edge of your seat as you rake in the highest possible rating of ""CRAZY.""
See for yourself how far your courage will take you against the best from around the world.

◆Compatible with Steam's Remote Play Together feature!

Use the Remote Play Together feature to play local multiplayer games with friends!

With the Remote Play Together feature, one player simply installs and runs the game to play it together with friends over the internet.


*Due to the specifications of Remote Play Together,
unexpected events such as play being interrupted or slow operation may occur depending on the connection of the host and guest.
